COVID-19 Local Response Initiative

Answers to Mayors’ Questions

The Bloomberg Harvard City Leadership Initiative is collaborating with Bloomberg Philanthropies’ COVID-19 Local Response Initiative to support mayors as they
manage the public health and economic crises in their cities.  As we answer
questions that come out of our sessions, we will organize it by category and share it
on this page. Answers given have been edited here for clarity.

Faculty & Experts

The faculty and experts that answered questions are presented below. Their names
and the date are listed at the end of their answers.

  • Linda Bilmes, the Daniel Patrick Moynihan Senior Lecturer in Public Policy at
    HKS
  • Lisa Cooper, Bloomberg Distinguished Professor at the Johns Hopkins
    Bloomberg School of Public Health
  • Amy Edmondson, the Novartis Professor of Leadership and Management at the
    Harvard Business School
  • Tom Friedel, former Director of the Center for Disease Control, President and
    CEO of Resolve to Save Lives
  • Rebecca Henderson, the John and Natty McArthur University Professor at
    Harvard University
  • Juliette Kayyem, the Belfer Senior Lecturer in International Security at HKS
View more
